storyInfo: Returning to the present, Reunion seems to have re-organized and is moving again. A woman named 'Nine' has decided to leave Lungmen, and Ch'en leads the black raincoat squad to the Yeti Squadron.

attributes.content: Move out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But we're really not familiar with the layout here. I'm worried... what if the Infected resist our operations?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Operator

attributes.content: Relax. I know the area. Just follow my orders.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, Sir!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Operator

attributes.content: Sir, bad news: intelligence reports Reunion is moving with some degree of organization again. It seems they've found another commander.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Operator

attributes.content: And... and they've reencrypted their communication channels. We can't intercept them anymore!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Operator

attributes.content: Could they have joined up with the units in the slums?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Impossible. Rhodes Island should already have dealt with the situation there. There's no risk of us getting boxed in.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Strange...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ah Ch'en, I'm ready to——
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: A transmission?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Little Miss,' would you mind giving me the room?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: How do you work it out so you're busy every time I have something for you?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Is that spy of yours back on the grid?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I said give me the room. And get me some finballs while you're out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm not a kid, you know.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...This is Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We have another Reunion element up from the lower levels of the slums.
Infected called Yeti Squad. It seems they have the ability to collapse buildings and destroy infrastructure.
Tread carefully.
...Understood.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Only-1, Lungmen's special forces are operating in the slums. We are at the moment incapable of stopping them. Exercise caution.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Roger.
...Only-1, why did you drop out of contact?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I had some things on my mind.
It's clear to me now. I'm leaving Lungmen to you.
What? I don't understand.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Me, now? I don't belong here.
Only-1!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm going to take some of Lungmen's Infected. The L. G. D. can't protect them. The city doesn't care about them.
In other words, this city isn't at all what you think it is.
Nine! You're under orders!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I haven't been with the L. G. D. for over three years.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: And actually it was me giving orders to you.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Nine...!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Those special forces you're talking about? I think I've seen them around.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I thought too much of this city. Goodbye, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Oh, right. Don't go snooping around the sewers.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Was I too loud?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're pretty loud. I think the whole block heard you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And yet I'm still not as loud as you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, Ah Ch'en, get over here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Have a seat.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Wow, Miss Swire squatting on a dirty street corner. You're not afraid to soil your clothes?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Certainly not! What makes you think I'd worry about a thing like that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I was just about to give that stinky sewer rat another call.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I may not come here often, but I'm pretty sure those special forces are up to no good.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Have you met Lin? From the slums?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I have. He's a nice old man. Nicer than my grandpa anyway.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They call him the 'Rat King.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The men behind the curtain aren't all like such. But he's really a good person.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I never thought Yühsia would turn out like this. She was such a shy and timid girl, the kind who would always hide behind you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I don't think she's changed. She just... took on responsibility. Maybe the kind she couldn't handle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It wouldn't do any good to tell her that. We're between a rock and hard place here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I can't say I understand what's going on between her and her father, but I know she's not so cold-blooded.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So I'm gonna call her.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That report I just got may be of use to us.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: A Reunion group with special powers has entered the slums, and they're able to command other Reunion elements.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And I'm the only one who knows. Well, now it's the two of us, I guess.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We steer the raincoats into them.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Aside from the group left to help the L. G. D. clean up the new-type Infected, there's also quite a few of those special forces with us in the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And the situation is: we don't know their distribution, we have no way to guard against them, and have no idea what they might do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But with Lin Yühsia's help, we can guide them into that Reunion team.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Force them out? Show them to the whole L. G. D.?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The L. G. D., sure, but also Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You trust them so much?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They chase their objectives harder than any group I've ever seen. They're even more dedicated than the L. G. D.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And who else are we going to trust?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've got stones, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ordinary Lungmenites don't know Lin, they don't know your grandfather, they don't even really know Wei Yenwu, let alone any chambers of commerce or whatever behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They just trust the L. G. D. None of those players would dare disband the L. G. D., and leave us with the regular old police.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then you add in the outsiders... And there's no way they'll want to take over.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: They'll fire you though.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Whoop-de-doo.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then let's wrap up this one last job! Next time, their patrol route goes right into the slums.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You can get Lin on board?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: As long as we look after this place, Lin will work with us.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: One more thing...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Did you know we have three guests?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Listen up, stinky rat, I've got news for you. There's a Reunion unit we can't hold. We need your team's help.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Impossible. What are you trying to pull?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Have I ever lied to you?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You said we'd go to the same secondary school, only for you to run off to Victoria.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm sorry. Really, truly sorry.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Forget it. I don't care.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia, your dad has done so much for Lungmen. We don't want to lose this place, and the people here can't lose us either.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Liar. You're coming here?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You'll come to the slums?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: ......Ch'en will.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You really are a terrible liar. What business have I with her?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: For whatever reason, your dad wasn't able to resolve the conflict between the Infected and the normal people, but Ch'en can.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ch'en and your father will rebuild the slums together.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They're working to turn it into a place where all kinds of people can live, to the point that we won't even be able to call it the slums anymore.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Think about it... Even though most Lungmenites don't live here, they've been coming here a lot in the past few years, haven't they?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Soon, we won't need any slums.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We haven't been able to solve the Infected crisis, but I know... We can make this a better place.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They'll be Lungmen's downtown Districts 22 to 29. No longer 'slums.'
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This city was built on the many, many different kinds of people all coming together to make it what it is today.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Lungmen can't afford to lose anyone.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yawn. How boring. You've become as boring as Ch'en.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Look, I'm not trying to make a soap opera here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Where is that Reunion unit?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I won't ask again.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Amiya, have you entered the slums?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We have a bit of a situation here. Let me fill you in.
attributes.name: Ch'en
